title: BMO chime falls back when client disconnected
description: Verify BMO immediately falls back to Telegram when no voice client is connected

steps.action: Stop the voice client (or ensure none is registered)
Trigger a notification event that has voice initiation enabled
steps.expected: Daemon checks voice registry — no client connected
Notification delivered immediately via Telegram text — no delay waiting for voice
Log entry: 'No voice client connected, falling back to Telegram'

result: PASS. Tested: (1) No voice client registered. (2) POST /voice/notify returns immediately: delivered=false, method=fallback, reason='No voice client connected'. (3) No delay — daemon checks registry and returns instantly.
